.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.0.6 (2015-06-23)
---------------------

* Add support for Spare Data Strategy and Unit settings for Metrics
* Prevent duplicate metrics
* Documentation improvements


0.0.5 (2015-06-12)
---------------------

* Element type is now easier to set

0.0.3 (2015-06-01)
---------------------

* Fixes for API URL setting

0.0.2 (2015-05-28)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
